title: 527 elliptic fibrations on Enriques surfaces
abstract:
Barth and Peters showed that a general complex Enriques surface has exactly
527 isomorphism classes of elliptic fibrations. We show that every Enriques
surface has precisely 527 isomorphism classes of elliptic fibrations when
counted with the appropriate multiplicity. Their reducible singular fibers and
the multiplicities can be calculated explicitly. The same statements hold over
any algebraically closed field of characteristic not two. To explain these
results, we construct a moduli space of complex elliptic Enriques surfaces and
study the ramification behavior of the forgetful map to the moduli space of
unpolarized Enriques surfaces. Curiously, the ramification indices of a similar
map compute the hyperbolic volume of the rational polyhedral fundamental domain
appearing in the Morrison-Kawamata cone conjecture.
